name: Jagged Knife Kneebreaker
flavor: An imposing brawler carrying a large club.

features.name: I’ve Got ‘Em - Passive
features.desc: Creatures Restrained by the Kneebreaker take double damage from attacks by other adversaries.

features.name: Hold Them Down - Action
features.desc: Make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, the target takes no damage but is Restrained and Vulnerable. The target can break free, clearing both conditions, with a successful Strength Roll or is freed automatically if the Kneebreaker takes Major or greater damage.
